name: @pierre/domain-utils
description: Shared domain utilities for Pierre applications (formatting, OAuth detection, categories)

scripts.preinstall:
node -e "if(!process.env.npm_execpath || !process.env.npm_execpath.includes('bun')) { console.error('
\x1b[31mERROR: Use bun, not npm/yarn!\x1b[0m
Run: bun install
'); process.exit(1); }"
